## Transportation and Fueling Services for Capital Experience Events
### Solicitation Overview
The Department of Canadian Heritage (PCH) invites qualified suppliers to provide transportation and fueling services for various events within the National Capital Region (NCR). 

### Key Highlights
* Unspsc: 78101801 (Local Area Trucking Services)
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Description
The Department of Canadian Heritage requires transportation and fueling services to support various events, including Canada Day and Winterlude. The services will consist of transporting equipment and supplies between the PCH warehouse in Ottawa, Ontario, and event sites in the National Capital Region. In some cases, out-of-town round-trip transportation may be required. The scope of work also includes timely fueling of machinery on event sites.

### Requirements
* Provide transportation equipment, vehicles, and operators to transport equipment and supplies.
* Ensure timely fueling of machinery on event sites.
* Support various events, including Canada Day and Winterlude, with additional events being added as required.

### Procurement Details
* Solicitation Number: 10222484-A
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2023-05-11
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-26T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-01
